title: A novel growth-friendly system alleviates pulmonary dysplasia in early-onset scoliosis combined with thoracic insufficiency syndrome: Radiological, pathological, and transcriptomic assessments
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Ying Zhang, Quan Li, Zhiyue Shi, Qitang Li, Xinfei Dai, Cheng Pan, Yujian Ma, Rongshuang Yan, Derui Fei, Jingming Xie
